greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n into two nonsquares.
comment: A172152 and A172153 give record values and where they occur: a(A172153(n))=A172152(n) and a(m) < A172152(n) for m < A172153(n).
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(n) = n/2 + O(sqrt(n)). - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 28 2016
program: (PARI) a(n)=n\2 - sqrtint(n) + sum(k=sqrtint(n\2)+1,sqrtint(n), issquare(n-k^2)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 28 2016
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 26 2010
ext: Typo in b-file link fixed by _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 10 2010
